SELECT MAX(SYS_DT) AS MAX_SYS_DT FROM SA_0420T where 1 = 1
AND DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}

SELECT AA.* FROM (SELECT A.ERP_PROC_DT , A.PFP_DT AS PFP_DT , A.PFP_DT AS CHG_PFP_DT /*납기일자에 맵핑됨.*/ , A.STOCK_CAU_CD /*재고원인*/ , CASE WHEN A.STOCK_CAU_CD = 'B' THEN 'C' ELSE A.STOCK_CAU_CD END AS CAUSES_CD , A.PTY_AMT , NVL(A.PTY_ORD_STAT_CD, 'C') AS PTY_ORD_STAT_CD , A.ERP_SEND_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SYS_DT, A.DLR_CD, A.PTY_ORD_YY_MM_DT, A.PTY_ORD_WKCNT_CD, A.CARLINE_CD, A.PTY_ORD_SERIAL_NO ORDER BY A.PTY_ORD_SEQ DESC) AS RN FROM SA_0420T A, SA_0416T B WHERE A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.PTY_ORD_YY_MM_DT = B.ORD_YYMM AND A.PTY_ORD_WKCNT_CD = B.ORD_WEEK AND A.CARLINE_CD = B.CARLINE_CD AND A.PTY_ORD_SERIAL_NO = B.SALES_NO AND (A.PORD_STS <> 'D' OR A.PORD_STS IS NULL) AND (A.PTY_ORD_STAT_CD = 'A' OR A.PTY_ORD_STAT_CD IS NULL) AND A.DMS_ORD_CANC_PSB_YN = 'Y' AND A.SYS_DT = #{sysDt} AND A.DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} AND A.PTY_ORD_YY_MM_DT = TO_CHAR(#{ptyOrdYyMmDt}, 'YYYYMM') AND A.PTY_ORD_WKCNT_CD = #{ptyOrdWkcntCd} AND A.CARLINE_CD = #{carlineCd} AND A.PTY_ORD_SERIAL_NO = #{ptyOrdSerialNo} AND A.PTY_ORD_SEQ = #{ptyOrdSeq} AND A.MODEL_CD = #{modelCd} AND A.OCN_CD = #{ocnCd} AND A.EXT_COLOR_CD = #{extColorCd} AND A.INT_COLOR_CD = #{intColorCd}) AA ORDER BY
AA.ERP_PROC_DT ASCDESC AA.PFP_DT ASCDESC AA.CHG_PFP_DT ASCDESC AA.STOCK_CAU_CD ASCDESC AA.CAUSES ASCDESC AA.PTY_AMT ASCDESC AA.PTY_ORD_STAT_CD ASCDESC AA.ERP_SEND_YN ASCDESC
AA.ERP_PROC_DT DESC
AA.ERP_PROC_DT DESC
